alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 9:41AM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of moderate snow expected. Additional snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern Vermont and northern New York. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be moderate to briefly heavy at times through the day before quickly ending this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence
